spaceArkanoid.helper

Interface GameEntity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ball, Brick, BrickBallSpawner, BrickEnlarger, PowerUp, Raquette

    public interface GameEntity
    Main interface for any GameEntity that is going to be rendered on screen
    Author:
    David Fain

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Responsible for "activating" the entity and its proper gameplay features (listeners for example)
      void deactivate()
      Responsible for "de-activating" the entity, used for pause / game-over and deleting of this entity
      GameEntityModel getModel()
      Convenience method to get the model attached to this entity
      void renderEntity(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
      Responsible for displaying the entity on the provided Graphics2D
      void updateEntity(double delta)
      Responsible for updating the entity for this frame

    • Method Detail

      • renderEntity

        void renderEntity(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Responsible for displaying the entity on the provided Graphics2D
        Parameters:
        g2 - the canvas on which to draw

      • updateEntity

        void updateEntity(double delta)
        Responsible for updating the entity for this frame
        Parameters:
        delta - the delta in time since the last frame

      • activate

        void activate()
        Responsible for "activating" the entity and its proper gameplay features (listeners for example)

      • deactivate

        void deactivate()
        Responsible for "de-activating" the entity, used for pause / game-over and deleting of this entity

      • getModel

        GameEntityModel getModel()
        Convenience method to get the model attached to this entity
        Returns:
        the model of the entity
